reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Dr. Thompson makes complex concepts accessible.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes moves too fast. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and patient with questions. Homework can be quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent lab instructor. Dr. Patel emphasizes safety and practical applications.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and assignments feel outdated. Grading is inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher! Dr. Sanchez brings real-world examples into the classroom.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be monotonous. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions in class. Dr. White encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject, but sometimes struggles to explain complex theories.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and engaging. Dr. Lee's virtual museum tours are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures can be biased. Prof. Wilson needs to encourage more diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Excellent field trips and hands-on projects. Dr. Green is dedicated to student success.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Patient and skilled instructor. Prof. Kim's composing workshops are invaluable.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research integrated into lessons. Dr. Martinez is an inspiration.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be abstract. More practical examples would help.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex concepts. Dr. Watson's enthusiasm is infectious.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Good industry connections but coursework could be more challenging.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Fantastic stargazing sessions! Dr. Clark makes the cosmos come alive.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Tough but fair. Prof. Zhang's practical projects prepare you for the industry.
